channel.title: Need help in 2 tings
channel.description:
need help in ting 1.: if i die on my server u dont loose any i want that u only hold ur 3 best items(or radom 3 items)
any1 know how i can make that u dont lose any and hold 3 items???
ting 2:
i tink i go add silab items on my server but than i want one ting:
that when u use Draconic visage on Anti-dragon shield
u get Dragonfire shield any1 can give the code and say where i must add[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 04:18:48 AM[/size][hr]nobdy know

item.title: Need help in 2 tings
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Draconic visage?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 08:12:01 AM[/size][hr]Add deze void


public void useItem(int itemUsed, int useWith) {
if ((playerName != null || playerName != "null")) {
if(itemUsed == 11816 && useWith == 1540) {
deleteItem(11816, getItemSlot(11816), 1);
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
addItem(11814, 1);
}

Post errors.
